main.name: Alison Tahiri
main.description: I am a former Business Manager with an absolute love for coding. I have a strong commitment in learning new things and challenge myself with new technologies.
main.bio: I am very curious by nature and I like to understand how things work. This way of thinking has helped me a lot in developing my problem solving skills and constantly grow. I currently work in the MERN stack.
main.contactmessage: Contact me if you are interested in a collaboration or just say hi!

resume.skillmessage: Below is what I think of my coding languages/frameworks skills level at the moment.

education.description: At Codecademy I learned a great deal about coding. It helped me greatly improve my coding skills and recall the foundations of web development.
This course helped me a great deal with time management, structuring and organization of writing projects and team collaboration.
In this institution, I learned about the foundations of Management which helped me not only in my professional career but also in organizing my other aspects of my life.

work.title: Manager
work.description: Responsible for contacting with the manufacturers for ordering products. Dealing with imports and exports on behalf of Purepro Albania. Organizing the distribution of water purification products and water filters. Arranging the marketing strategy of the company. Maintaining the relations with other companies of the same industry in Albania and establishing joint collaborations.

work.title: Sales team training specialist
work.description: I was responsible for presenting new products to the sales team and training them in implementing the companyâ€™s marketing strategies. Presenting new water filtration products to the plumbers and explaining them how to mount new systems.

testimonials.text: Alison is a very professional developer. He worked for our University in building a tasks application for the professors in the Economy Department. Besides being very friendly, he met all the requirements and deadlines.
